CROSS IN TRAY.dev_comment: The Cross-in-Tray function is a multimodal benchmark with 4 global minima. It is challenging for optimization algorithms due to its steep, narrow valleys.
CROSS IN TRAY.reference: @misc{cross_in_tray_function, title={Benchmark Functions for Optimization}, year={2024}, note={Custom implementation}}
CROSS IN TRAY.summary: Multimodal, continuous, challenging benchmark function with steep valleys and 4 global minima. It's defined only for 2 dimensions.
